objectives: Students will discuss shopping and consumer behavior using Neutral/Standard register language
Students will engage with Thriller/Suspense themed scenarios related to shopping and consumer behavior
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of neutral level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining shopping and consumer behavior content with Thriller/Suspense narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore shopping and consumer behavior through a Thriller/Suspense lens using Neutral/Standard language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a dangerous or threatening situation involving shopping and consumer behavior

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice neutral register vocabulary related to shopping and consumer behavior in a thriller context
Students engage in thriller themed role-play about shopping and consumer behavior using neutral register
Students create original thriller themed content about shopping and consumer behavior in neutral register

discussion_questions: How would you describe shopping and consumer behavior in a Thriller/Suspense scenario?
What suspense or threat might be involved in shopping and consumer behavior?
Can you create a Thriller/Suspense story about shopping and consumer behavior?
How does shopping and consumer behavior change when viewed through a Thriller/Suspense perspective?
What neutral register expressions would you use to discuss this thriller scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Thriller/Suspense situation involving shopping and consumer behavior
roles: Character A: Using neutral register in thriller context
Character B: Responding in neutral register within thriller theme

topic_genre_blend: shopping and consumer behavior with suspense
shopping and consumer behavior with threat
shopping and consumer behavior with danger

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Neutral/Standard throughout: Standard professional communication
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Thriller/Suspense theme: Tension, danger, psychological intensity

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Neutral/Standard register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Thriller/Suspense themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of neutral register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
